formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A SYNTAX ERROR occurs with the following message:

listitem.screen: Parse[28] env←⊃ParseFeBindings/k,⊂MtNTE ⍝ Initial Fe bindings to feed in

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: There are two flipped negations and a typo in this function which were not caught during verification. Fixing this fixes the issue.
